arm_group.description: Methotrexate (MTX) 0.4mg/(kg·d) intramuscularly (IM) on days 1-5; If β-hCG level can not drop to 1/10 of the origin level during the following 3 weeks, additional course is administered at 2-week intervals, after the first normal hCG value has been recorded.

Act-d 0.6mg/m(2), IV, on day1,2; MTX 100mg/m(2), IV, on day1 (after Act-d); MTX 200mg/m(2), IVgtt, on day1 (after MTX, 500ml NS, >4h); If β-hCG level can not drop to 1/10 of the origin level during the following 3 weeks, additional course is administered at 2-week intervals, after the first normal hCG value has been recorded.

MTX 0.4mg/(kg·d) intramuscularly (IM) on days 1-5, 2-week intervals;
1 cycle of chemotherapy should be given after the first normal hCG level.

brief_summary.textblock:
The investigators will conduct a trial to determine whether methotrexate single-dose
      treatment and methotrexate/Actinomycin-D single-dose treatment work well as multiple courses
      of single agent chemotherapy in low-risk gestational trophoblastic neoplasia.

clinical_study.brief_title: Methotrexate Single-dose Treatment and Methotrexate/Actinomycin-D Single-dose Treatment in Low-Risk Gestational Trophoblastic Neoplasia

intervention.description: MTX 100mg/m(2), IV, on day1 (after Act-d); MTX 200mg/m(2), IVgtt, on day1 (after MTX, 500ml NS, >4h)

facility.name: Tongji Hospital, Tongji Medical College, Huazhong University of Science and Technology
Women's Hospital, School of Medicine, Zhejiang University

clinical_study.official_title: A Multicenter, Prospective, Randomized Trial of Methotrexate Single-dose Treatment and Methotrexate/Actinomycin-D Single-dose Treatment in Low-Risk Gestational Trophoblastic Neoplasia

primary_outcome.description: It is difficult to estimate the exact cycles of chemotherapy，we may calculate the rate of complete response and the rate of treatment failure at the preliminary end point of the trail.
primary_outcome.measure: Severity of adverse events as assessed by the WHO

primary_outcome.description: It is difficult to estimate the exact cycles of chemotherapy，we may calculate the rate of complete response and the rate of treatment failure at the preliminary end point of the trail.

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: Huazhong University of Science and Technology
responsible_party.investigator_title: Director of the department of Obstetrics and Gynecology, Tongji Hospital

secondary_outcome.time_frame: at the time the first resume menstruation after treatment completed

secondary_outcome.description: to calculate the pregnancy rate in an actuarial manner using the Kaplan-Meier method at the end of the trail
to calculate the delivery rate in an actuarial manner using the Kaplan-Meier method at the end of the trail
secondary_outcome.measure: the delivery rate with at least one live born baby

secondary_outcome.description: to observe the incidence of abnormal pregnancy i.e., stillbirths, neonatal deaths, miscarriages before 14 weeks, miscarriages after 14 weeks, terminations, ectopic pregnancy, molar pregnancy.

clinical_study.source: Huazhong University of Science and Technology

collaborator.agency: Huazhong University of Science and Technology
